```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(seewave)
library(tuneR)
```

```{r}
o1<-readWave('Audioswav/Oscar a1.wav')
plot(o1)
```

```{r}
spectro(o1,f=o1@samp.rate,wl=128,wn='hanning',ovlp=50,osc=TRUE,flim=c(0,2))
```

```{r}
fm<-o1@samp.rate
wlen<-0.02*fm # 20 ms
zcr<-zcr(o1,wl=wlen,ovlp=50,plot=T)
```
